All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Algorithms
This class contains the algorithms used in the game.
Algorithms.Cell
Helper class for the BFS algorithm.
Allies
This enum represents the type of allies that can be used in the game.
Ally
This class represents an ally (archer) in the game.
AllyButton
This class represents a custom JButton for showing an Ally.
AllyManager
This class manages a List of Ally.
AudioManager
This class manages the audio played in the game.
Bee
This class represents a Bee (enemy) in the game.
Directions
This enum represents the type of directions that can be made in the game.
EditorBar
This class represents a custom bar for the level editing scene.
Enemy
This abstract class represents an enemy in the game.
EnemyManager
This class manages Enemies in a List.
EnemyTypes
This enum represents the type of enemies in the game.
Game
This path containts the games base logic.
GameDifficulties
This enum represents the type of difficulties in the game.
GameLevels
This enum represents the type of game levels in the game.
GameOver
This class represents the game over scene.
GameSettings
This class handles the settings related tp the game.
GameStates
This enum represents the type of game states in the game.
LevelEdit
This class represents the level editing scene.
MapConstants
This class containts contants related to the map in the game.
MapTile
This class represents a tile on the map in the game.
MapTiles
This enum represents the type of tiles on the map in the game.
Menu
This class represents the menu scene.
MenuButton
This class represents a custom JButton for the menu scene.
MyComboBox<E extends Enum<E>>
This class represents a custom JComboBox for the menu scene.
MySliderChangeListener
This class represents a custom JSlider for the settings scene.
Ogre
This class represents an Ogre (enemy) in the game.
Play
This class represents the play scene.
PlayBar
This class represents a custom bar for the play scene.
Point
This class represents a Point for storing x and y coordinates.
Projectile
This class represents a Projectile (arrow) in the game.
ProjectileManager
This class manages a List of Projectiles.
ResourceManager
This class manages the games resources.
SceneManager
This class manages switching between scenes.
Settings
This class represents the settings scene.

TileButton
This class represents a custom JButton for the level editing scene.
Wave
This class represents a wave in the game.
WaveManager
This class manages a List of Waves.
Wolf
This class represents a Wolf (enemy) in the game.
